title: The Most Unloved Bull Market Finally Comes to an End, Impact of Coronavirus on Global Markets
itunes:title: The Most Unloved Bull Market Finally Comes to an End, Impact of Coronavirus on Global Markets
description:
We get the Businessweek Agenda with Bloomberg Intelligence Chief Equity Strategist Gina Martin Adams and Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson. Bloomberg News White House Correspondent Josh Wingrove discusses President Trump’s response to Democrats’ virus bill. Lauren Sauer, Assistant Professor of Emergency Medicine at Johns Hopkins School of Medicine, walks through emergency preparedness measures for the coronavirus outbreak. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg Markets Live Blog Senior Editor Mike Regan provide insight on the most unloved bull market finally coming to an end. Bloomberg Businessweek Assistant Managing Editor Jim Ellis breaks down how the coronavirus is impacting global businesses. And we Drive to the Close with JJ Kinahan, Chief Market Strategist at TD Ameritrade.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Paul Brennan


See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
